name: Acidic Drool
description: As an incidental, spend a dark side Destiny Point to give the toothy bite weapon the Burn 2 quality until the end of the chemilizard’s turn; this is a chemical burn.

name: Advanced Language Module
description: When encountering a new species or language not in its databases, a TC-series protocol droid may make an :easy: Knowledge (Education) check to learn enough of the new dialect to communicate.

name: All the Luck in the Galaxy
description: When making a check to gamble, a Deception check, or a Negotia­tion check, add :force: to the check. Each :lightside: result automatically adds :success: to the check. :darkside::darkside: results automatically add :despair: to the check.

name: Alliance Leader
description: Alliance operatives add :boost: to all Vigilance and Perception checks when in the NPC’s presence.

name: Allelochemical Transmitters
description: May spend :threat: generated by the PCs to allow the Falleen to evoke fear, desire, anger, doubt, confusion, or another emotion in the character targeting him, inflicting 1 Strain per :threat:.

name: Ambushers
description: Targets add :setback::setback: to all checks made to avoid surprise or notice traps when attacked by monkey-lizards.

name: Ammonia Breather
description: Breathes ammonia, must use a respirator, and if exposed to oxygen, treats it as a dangerous atmosphere with rating 8.

name: Amphibious
description: May breathe underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalties for travelling through water.

name: Animal Combatant
description: Upgrade ability of checks when fighting wild creatures once.

name: Aquatic Creature
description: Suffers no penalties for moving through water and can breathe underwater, but cannot move or survive on land.

name: Arboreal Creature
description: Bearsloths treat trees and branches as normal terrain and do not make checks or spend extra maneuvers in order to move along them vertically or horizontally.

name: Asharl Pelt
description: Remove :setback: on Survival checks due to cold environments.

name: Aura of Command
description: Spend a maneuver to allow one allied minion group at Medium range to immediately perform one maneuver or action. Add :boost: to any actions they perform.

name: Awkward
description: While they have great physical strength their bulk imposes severe limitations in flexibility and agility; they add :setback::setback::setback: to all Brawl, Melee, and Coordination checks they’re required to make.

name: Backup Entertainer
description: When a SDMN Session Droid performs the Assist maneuver to help a character make a check as part of a performance, that character adds automatic :advantage::advantage: to the result.

name: Bad Knee
description: If TH-313 generates :threat::threat::threat: or :despair: on an Athletics, Brawl, or Melee check, he is immobilised for one round.

name: Bantha Affinity
description: Add :boost: to all Survival checks to handle or ride Banthas.

name: Barbed Hide
description: When the creature is hit by a melee attack, the GM can spend :threat::threat: to inflict 1 Wound (ignoring Soak) on the attacker.

name: Beast of Burden
description: Add {ranks} to the creature’s encumbrance threshold.

name: Berzerk Rage
description: Deal +1 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks when suffering any Wounds. When suffering a Critical Injury, deal +2 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks instead.

name: Blabber Mouth
description: Add :setback: to all social skill checks against a monkey-lizard’s owner.

name: Bloodfly Sickness
description: A character who takes damage from a bloodfly bite must make an :average: Resilience check; failure results in 4 damage, ignoring Soak, and the character halves their Strain Threshold, rounding up, until the character spends at least an hour in a bacta tank or undergoes similarly extensive medical treatment (as determined by the GM).

name: Brute Strength
description: May add :advantage: to all Brawn-related skill checks.

name: Blessing of the Ancients
description: Once per game session as an incidental, the elder may have a character within Short range heal 4 wounds.

name: Blubber
description: +1 Soak.

name: Bite at Their Heels
description: When engaged with a target, allies receive :boost: to combat checks made against the engaged target.

name: Camouflaged (Snow)
description: When in snowy environments, add :boost::boost: to all Stealth checks.

name: Camouflaged (Jungle)
description: When in jungle environments, add :boost::boost: to all Stealth checks.

name: Changeling
description: As an action may suffer 3 Strain and make an :average: Resilience check. If successful may change appearance to that of any observed Silhoutte 1 character. An observing character must make an opposed Perception vs. Deception check to detect that something is amiss.

name: Cloak
description: Add :setback::setback::setback: to all checks made to spot or track the maalraa (this can include Vigilance checks made for Initiative if the maalraa ambushes a character). Force-sensitive characters ignore this ability.

name: Clone Inhibitor Chip
description: So long as the proper chain of command is observed, upgrade the ability of Leadership checks targeting a clone trooper once.

name: Code of Silence
description: Upgrade difficulty of any checks made to obtain any information from this target about the Karazak Slavers’ Cooperative once.

name: Companion Animal
description: Once per encounter, may make an :easy: Charm check targeting an engaged character; that character recovers 1 Strain per :success:.

name: Computer Affinity
description: The Intrusion Specialist may add :force: to any Computers check or Skulduggery check to analyse or infiltrate a security system. Spend :forcepip: to add :advantage: to the check. Spend :forcepip::forcepip: to add :success: to any Computers check.

name: Constabulary Honour
description: Add automatic {ranks|threat} to all social checks made to convince a constable to act against the best interest of Sullust.

name: Constrictor
description: Opponents affected by the En­snare quality immediately begin suffering the effects of suffocation.

name: Cornered Fury
description: May upgrade one skill die when engaged and outnumbered by enemies.

name: Covering Fire
description: May spend a maneuver to add +1 ranged Defence to up to three allied characters or minion groups within Short range until the end of the next round; this does not stack with multiple uses.

name: Create Bacta
description: Vratix can secrete one litre of bacta per day.

name: Creature of Illusion
description: Combat checks targeting Moraband Sith phantasms always use Willpower in place of the characteristic normally associated with that skill; the Pierce and Breach qualities do not reduce a Sith phantasm’s soak.

name: Creature of the Sea
description: Aiwhas are not capable of operating on land.

name: Critical Eye
description: Gain :boost: on all rolls made to duplicate a familiar document.

name: Crushing Grip
description: Can maintain a grip on an unfortunate target; as long as it has a victim immobilised in its tentacles, it inflicts 2 Strain and 1 Wound at the start of the victim’s turn.

name: Crushing Body
description: Any victim affected by the korrak’s Ensnare quality suffers 2 Strain and 1 Wound ignoring Soak at the beginning of their turn.

name: Crystalline
description: Does not need to breathe and can survive in vacuum and underwater; immune to poisons and toxins.

name: Cunning Ambusher
description: Opponents add {ranks|setback} to Initiative checks using Vigilance.

name: Cybernetic Communications
description: Due to their cybernetic modifications, Ganks can communicate silently with other Ganks.

name: Cybernetic Reinforcement
description: Guavian Death Gang members ignore Stun damage and can survive in vacuum and underwater for ten minutes.

name: Cyborg
description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink and can survive in vacuum or underwater; immune to poisons and toxins.

name: Darkest Dreams
description: A Moraband Sith phantasm can spend :advantage::advantage: on a combat check or :threat::threat: on an engaged enemy’s combat check to have the target make an :average-1: fear check; if the target fails, the phantasm transforms into a figure inspired by the target’s greatest fear in addition to any other effects of the failed check.

name: Death Lunge
description: When incapacitated, daly­rakes make one out-of-turn Brawl attack against one opponent with whom they are engaged. This check gains :boost:.

name: Dense Feathers
description: Immune to the effects of cold and hazardous weather.

name: Desert Dweller
description: When making skill checks Twi’leks may remove :setback: imposed due to arid and hot environmental conditions.

name: Detect Force-Sensitivity
description: The vornskr may make an :average: Perception check to detect all Force-sensitive creatures or characters with a Force rating within Medium range; this ability functions regardless of intervening terrain or material.

name: Dive Attack
description: The first attack made during an encounter gains +2 damage and :boost:.

name: Dive-bomb
description: As an action, may make an opposed Coercion check vs. Cool against one character at up to Medium range; on a success, the target is staggered for one round and the falcon moves to engaged with the target; :advantage: may be spent to cause the target to suffer 1 Strain, and :triumph: may be spent to extend the effect of the stagger by 1 round.

name: Drain Life
description: Whenever a shaoryn inflicts damage on a target after Soak, it heals half that many wounds (rounded up).

name: Draw Closer (Skysnare)
description: The skysnare may take a Draw Closer action, making a Brawl combat check against one Silhouette 1 (or smaller) target within Medium range and adding :force::force: to the check. The skysnare may spend :forcepip: before resolving the success or failure of the check to move the target one range band closer to the skysnare (including from Short to Engaged). It may also spend :forcepip: to add :success: to the combat check. If the skysnare cannot move its target to engage it, the combat check automatically misses.

name: Droid
description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink and can survive in vacuum or underwater; immune to poisons and toxins.

name: Destabilizing Influence
description: As a maneuver once per encounter, may add :threat: to all subsequent Cool and Discipline checks made by enemies within Medium range for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Domesticable
description: Downgrade the difficulty of checks to train this creature {ranks|times}.

name: Domesticated
description: Difficulty for training this creature is not upgraded.

name: Duracrete Plating
description: Melee and ranged attacks targeting it gain :setback: due to its armored carapace (included in Defence rating); characters may aim to hit weak spots and ignore 1 Soak.

name: Energy Parasite
description: Mynocks can make an :average: Coordination check to latch onto any starship or vehicle they are engaged with. Ships or vehicles with a mynock attached suffer 1 System Strain per mynock each day and reduce their han­dling by 1.

name: Enhanced Senses
description: Add :advantage: to any Perception checks.

name: Enhanced Nemesis Combat
description: Add an additional NPC Initiative slot at the end of the Initiative order. The nemesis may take a second turn during the same round in this slot. Any effects that are supposed to end during his next turn end instead during his next turn in the following round.

name: Envenomed Bite
description: Whenever the bearsloth suc­cessfully attacks a target (whether or not it deals damage), the GM may flip a dark side Destiny Point to have the target suffer the effects of being exposed to bearsloth venom.

name: Etiquette and Protocol
description: Protocol droids allow allies to add :boost: to any Negotiation checks or other checks made to negotiate or mediate.

name: Etiquette and Protocol (Improved)
description: Protocol droids allow allies to add :boost: to any Negotiation checks or other checks made to negotiate or mediate, no matter the species involved.

name: Excellent Climber
description: Once per game session, the thaelo may reroll any one Athletics check made when climbing.

name: Fearsome Aspect
description: Add :boost: to all Coercion checks.

name: Fearsome Countenance
description: Add automatic :advantage: to Coercion checks.

name: Fire Sweep
description: As an action, can make a :hard: ranged combat check to inflict one hit that deals base damage with its built-in twin blasters on up to two targets within Medium range, plus one additional target per :advantage: on the check; it can only hit each target once this way.

name: Firefighter
description: May make an :average: Athletics check to extinguish a fire; success extinguishes the fire within a number of rounds determined by the GM, and additional successes may reduce the time needed to extinguish the fire. Particularly large or dangerous fires may require more difficult checks at the GM’s discretion.

name: Fire Resistant
description: Immune to fire damage or damage from weapons with the Burn quality.

name: Force Hunter
description: Gain :boost: to all combat checks made against Force-sensitive creatures or characters with a Force rating.

name: Frightening Visage
description: As an ac­tion, may make an opposed Deception check vs. Vigilance (when multiple opponents are present, the best Vigilance skill determines difficulty) to create illusion of greater size and threat. If the snowfeather succeeds, all opponents present must make a :hard: fear check. Force-sensitive characters add :setback: to the fear check; droids and other characters immune to Force powers automatically pass the check.

name: Force Mimic
description: At the GM’s discretion, the kaaten may make an opposed Charm or Deception versus Vigilance check as an action to pretend to be a friend, companion, loved one, or of the same spe­cies as its target. When doing so, add :force: to the check; :lightside: results add :success: to Charm checks, while :darkside: results add :success: to Deception checks. If the check succeeds, the illusion is successful, though what effect this has on gameplay depends on the situation and can be determined by the GM. Targets immune to Force powers are immune to these effects.

name: Intimidating Presence
description: All enemies within Short range add :threat: to all skill checks they make.

name: Immobile
description: Cannot spend maneuvers to move.

name: Invoke Doellin
description: Once per encounter, the Doellinist High Priest may re-roll a social skill check that targeted a Gran character.

name: Many-armed
description: The creature gains :boost: on all Brawl checks and may spend :advantage::advantage: on a successful melee attack to hit a second target Engaged with it, dealing the same damage as dealt to the original target.

name: Fecklen Boom
description: As an action, may make an :easy: Survival check; each :success: causes one target in Medium range to be disoriented for 1 round. Each :advantage::advantage: extends the number of rounds by 1 (a disori­ented target adds :setback: to all skill checks performed).

name: Fearless
description: Immune to the effects of fear.

name: Fierce Pounce
description: If the creature uses the Aim maneuver, it also gains Knockdown on its next attack.

name: Flyer
description: This creature can fly.

name: For Quolas!
description: As an action, make an :average: Leadership check to add :boost: to all combat checks by allies within Short range for one round.

name: Sathari Glider
description: A Sathari can glide over small dis­tances while falling and does not suffer damage from falling while conscious.

name: Glider
description: Varactyls can suffer 2 strain to count as a flyer for the remainder of the turn.

name: Gun Crew
description: For each Imperial Gunnery Corps member in the minion group beyond the first, reduce the Cumbersome rating of their weapons by 1.

name: Hard to Kill
description: The GM may flip one dark side Destiny Point to have the Kintan Strider heal 5 Wounds.

name: Hardy
description: Murra add :boost: to all Resilience checks.

name: Heat Resistance
description: Remove up to :setback: from any checks due to hot or arid environmen­tal conditions.

name: Heightened Sense of Smell
description: Razhak upgrade all Perception checks once.

name: Helium Allergy
description: When exposed to helium mynocks suffer 1 Wound per round ignoring Soak until their bodies inflate and explode.

name: Hover
description: May reduce speed to 0 and remain aloft.

name: Hoverer
description: When hovering the character does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

name: Huttese
description: Hutt security droid neither speaks nor understands Basic.

name: Humming Vibrations
description: As an action, may make an opposed Charm vs. Discipline check against a target at up to Medium range to disorient the target for a number of rounds equal to :success:; may spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to stag­ger the target for 1 round instead.

name: Imperial Valour
description: May perform a maneuver to cause all ranged attacks targeting the character to instead hit one ally or helpless enemy in Engaged range, until the beginning of the character’s next turn.

name: Imperial Haughtiness
description: When a non-humanoid alien species is targeting Grayson with a social skill, add :setback:.

name: Improved Covering Fire
description: When allied minion groups within Short range perform the Covering Fire maneuver, they add +2 Ranged Defence instead.

name: Infravision
description: Remove :setback: imposed due to light­ing conditions.

name: Ink Spray
description: Once per encounter, as an out-of-turn incidental, a Quarren may spit ink from a specialised sac within their gills, suffering 2 Strain to add :setback: to a combat check made by a character within Short range (under water, it adds :setback::setback::setback: to the combat check instead).

name: Insectoid Appear­ance
description: LOM-series protocol droids allow allies to remove :setback: from Nego­tiation checks or other checks made to negotiate or mediate when dealing with insectoid species.

name: Jet booster
description: Allows this character to fly, as per the rules in the Flying sidebars in Chapter VI: Conflict and Combat in the core rulebooks.

name: Jungle Hunter
description: Sludge panthers suffer no penalties when moving through rough terrain in dense jungle, dense forest, or swampy environments.

name: Keen Senses
description: Thanks to their finely honed senses of sight and hearing, they gain :boost: on all Perception checks.

name: Leap
description: Add :boost::boost: to all Athletics checks made to perform vertical or horizontal jumps.

name: Leader
description: All subordinates within Medium range add :boost: to all Discipline checks.

name: Lightning Charge
description: Once per encounter, can use a maneuver to move to Engaged with a target at Medium range; any melee attacks made by the beast or its rider against that target this turn add 2 damage.

name: Light-Sensitive
description: Defel are vulnerable to bright lights, which cause them intense pain and temporary blindness if v1ewed without protection. A Defel exposed to bright light without protective goggles suffers :setback::setback: on all skill checks.

name: Living Shadow
description: Add :setback::setback: to all combat checks and Perception checks against phantasmal beasts of Morabandand and :boost::boost: to all Stealth checks the beasts make, in addition to any dice gained for darkness; applies even to characters not hampered by normal darkness.

name: Long Arms
description: The grey bear’s arms are surprisingly long and nimble, removing :setback: imposed on its combat checks due to an opponent’s defence.

name: Lorekeeper
description: Remove {ranks|setback} from all Knowledge: Lore checks.

name: Low-Tech User
description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to use unfamiliar technology once.

name: Loyalty
description: Upgrade the difficulty of social checks targeting the Vodran enforcer once if they conflict with the Vodran enforcer’s loyalty or interfere with his duty to his Hutt masters.

name: Loyalty Imprint
description: Add :boost: lo all checks made to defend its designated master.

name: Luck Be a Lady
description: Once per encounter, Lando may reroll a skill check.

name: Magnetic Sense
description: All Devlikk gain :boost: on any Coordination or Piloting checks and know which way is north at all times.

name: Mandalorian Visage
description: Add :success: to the result of Coercion checks to intimidate if Kad is wearing his Mandalorian heavy battle armour.

name: Military Analyst
description: M-3PO-series military protocol droids allow allies to add :boost: to any Knowledge (Warfare) checks that benefit from an understanding of logistics or military procedure.

name: Natural Camouflage
description: Any Perception checks made to detect the creature suffer :setback::setback:; this affects scanners and macrobinoculars using thermal sensors or passive light amplification as well.

name: Near-Sighted
description: Add :setback: to ranged attacks and vision-based Perception checks at long and extreme range.

name: Negate Force Powers
description: An adult ysalamir creates a spherical zone extending out to Short range, inside which Force-sensitive characters and creatures cannot exert influence over the Force. Inside this zone, any Force powers, Force talents, or other abilities that the GM decides work via the Force do not function. Likewise, such powers may not affect or detect any­thing within this zone.

name: Networking
description: For every three DUM-series droids in a group, add :boost: to all Computers, Mechanics, and Perceptions checks.

name: Neurotoxin Doses
description: The Imperial assassin has multiple doses of neurotoxin, which can be introduced into food or drink, or applied to a Melee weapon as a maneuver; if applied to a weapon, it lasts for the remainder of the encounter; if a target ingests poisoned food or drink, or suffers wounds from a poisoned Melee weapon, the target must make an :average: Resilience check; if failed, the target suffers 5 Wounds, plus 1 Strain per :threat:; :despair: means the target must test against the poison again at the start of the next turn.

name: Neurotoxin
description: If a target suffers wounds from a kouhun’s mandible attack, the target must make an :average: Resilience check. The target suffers 5 Wounds if he fails, plus 1 Strain per :threat:; :despair: means the target must check against the poison again at the start of his next turn.

name: Nightvision
description: Remove all :setback: added to checks due to low-light conditions or darkness.

name: Olfactory Perception
description: Gain :boost: on all Sur­vival checks made to track prey, and adds :setback: to enemy Stealth checks made against the vrblthers.

name: Olfactory Sensor Suite
description: Reduces the difficulty of scent-based Perception checks by 1.

name: Ornery
description: Add :setback::setback: to all checks made to handle, domesticate, or otherwise work with a nerf.

name: Overrun
description: The ronto may spend :advantage: to hit an additional target with a successful Brawl check, provided the additional target is engaged with the first target.

name: Pack Instincts
description: When performing the assist maneuver, grant :boost::boost: instead of :boost:.

name: Paralysing Neurotoxin
description: If the korrak hits its target with a bite attack, the target must immediately make a :hard: Resilience check; failure means the target is immobilised for 1 round, plus 1 round per :threat: generated; :despair: on a successful or failed check means the target is staggered for one round.

name: Pheromone Communication
description: Weequay may communicate with other Weequay using pheromones if they are within Short range of each other.

name: Plated Hide
description: Add {ranks|setback} to all combat checks against this target.

name: Poisonous
description: Any creature that successfully hits the amphibipole with a successful unarmed attack must succeed at a :hard: Resilience check or be poisoned, suffering 3 Wounds at the beginning of the turn for the next three rounds (this ignores Soak).

name: Poisonous Bite
description: Anyone bitten by a Savrip must succeed at an :average: Resilience check or lose their free maneuver for five rounds.

name: Ponderous
description: Can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

name: Ponderous (Thalassian)
description: Without their repulsor packs Thalassians can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

name: Photonic Burst
description: Once per encoun­ter as an action, photon spider can unleash a pulse of light from its body; all targets within Short range are disoriented for two turns.

name: Pirate Leader
description: May perform a maneuver to give orders to other pirate allies in Medium range, granting them :boost: on their next check.

name: Pre-emptive Avoidance
description: Immediately after an opponent moves to engage an albek, the albek may spend one Destiny Point to disengage from the opponent as an out of turn incidental.

name: Reckless Strike
description: As an incidental, once per round, the GM may have the Kintan Strider reroll a Brawl or Melee check; if he does so, the Kintan Strider loses the benefits of the Adversary and Durable talents until the beginning of its next turn.

name: Regeneration
description: When recovering from wounds via natural rest or in a bacta tank, recover 1 additional Wound; first-aid, medical treatment, and stimpacks do not result in recovery from an additional wound; Trandoshans can regrow lost limbs, though it usually takes at least a month before such limbs are usable.

name: Resilient Metabolism
description: Add :success: to any Resilience checks.

name: Restraint
description: Increase the difficulty of a Melee or Ranged: Light attack check by one in order to in­flict Stun damage and gain the Knockdown quality; spend :advantage: to grant this ability to a Quolas guard minion group at Short range for one round.

name: Rhetoric Mimic
description: May make Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks using the characteristics of its master; such checks suffer :setback::setback: due to the imperfect mimicry, and the droid does not benefit from any relevant talents its master possesses.

name: Sand Walker
description: Remove :setback: from any checks made to traverse sandy or desert terrain.

name: Searing Touch
description: When an opponent ends its turn engaged with the razhak, the opponent suffers 2 Wounds and 2 Strain.

name: Scorching Touch
description: When an opponent ends its turn engaged with the fissrit, the opponent suffers 1 Wound and 1 Strain.

name: Self-destruct Mechanism
description: Should the probe droid’s mission become compromised, it may self-destruct as an out of turn incidental; this explosion does 10 damage to Engaged characters.

name: Sensor Masking
description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to detect or analyse the droid with electronic equipment or sensors once.

name: Sessile
description: This creature is unable to perform Move maneuvers.

name: Shadowed
description: When in darkness or deep shadow, add :boost::boost: to all Stealth checks.

name: Shadowblend
description: Upgrade the difficulty once when spotting or targeting runderen that are in darkness.

name: Shield Projector
description: Maneuver to activate or deactivate; while active, gains Defence 2 and upgrades the difficulty of all combat attacks targeting the droideka once, but droideka cannot use the move maneuver.

name: Shriek
description: A minion group of four or more blismal can set up a shrieking racket as an action. All targets within Close range must make a :hard: Resilience check. Failure causes a target to suffer 4 Strain and become disoriented until the noise stops. Characters in sealed armour or who are wearing ear protection are not affected.

name: Sight Hunter
description: Ibbots decrease the difficulty of any Perception or Vigilance checks they make by one.

name: Silent Hunter
description: Opponents suffer :setback::setback: on any Perception or Vigilance checks made to detect a sand panther while it is hunting.

name: Silhouette
description: The difficulty of an attack made against a character 2 silhouettes larger than the attacker is decreased by 1. The difficulty of an attack made against a character 2 or more silhouettes smaller than the attacker is increased by 1.

name: Skilled Cheater
description: Once per session when gambling, the character may cancel a :despair: he rolls on a skill check, or add a :despair: to another character’s check.

name: Slave Authority
description: May use Coercion in place of Leadership when commanding slaves.

name: Spaceport Leader
description: Spaceport staff add :boost: to all Vigilance and Perception checks when in the Spaceport Administrator’s presence.

name: Soothing Song
description: The jubba bird may make an :average: Charm check to heal 1 Strain per :success: from all creatures within Medium range.

name: Sticky Saliva
description: Knytix produce viscous saliva that can be used as an adhesive.

name: Stinky
description: While within Short range of a Huttlet, non-Hutt char­acters reduce their Strain thresholds by 2.

name: Strong as a Jakobeast
description: Jako­beasts have an encumbrance threshold of 20.

name: Strong as a Murra
description: Murra have an encumbrance threshold of 25, and the difficulty of all Athlet­ics checks made to lift excessive encumbrance is reduced by one.

name: Stubborn
description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to train eopies by one.

name: Stubborn and Dependable
description: Remove :setback: from all checks Ugnaught mechanics perform.

name: Suited to the Cold
description: Immune to the effects of freezing and cold environments.

name: Suited to the Heat
description: Immune to the effects of heat and hot environments.

name: Su­premely Terrifying
description: Upon first seeing a sando aqua monster, an individual must make a :daunting-1: fear check to reflect the sheer dread the beast invokes.

name: Surefooted
description: Suffer no penalties when moving through difficult terrain.

name: Surgeon’s Aid
description: When a minion group of one or more Mini-Meds performs the Assist maneuver to help a character with a Medicine check, that character counts as having +1 rank in the Surgeon talent per Mini-Med in the group.

name: Swarm
description: Halve the damage dealt to the swarm before applying Soak unless the weapon has the Blast or Burn quality, regardless of whether or not that quality is activated.

name: Sweep Attack
description: The creature can spend :triumph: on a successful Brawl check to hit the target as well as anyone engaged with the target.

name: Swipe
description: Spend :advantage: during melee combat to cause an engaged opponent to suffer 1 Strain.

name: Tactical Direction
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one allied minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free maneuver or add :boost: to its next check.

name: Trained Mount
description: Add {ranks|boost} to a rider’s Survival checks while mounted.

name: Trample
description: If the creature takes a maneuver to move closer to its target before attacking, it gains :boost: to its attack check and deals +2 damage.

name: Territorial
description: Spukami are incredibly territorial, and gain :boost: to all Brawl checks made when attacking any intruders into what they consider their territory.

name: Teamwork
description: Add :boost: to all checks during combat while within Medium range of one or more clone trooper allies.

name: Terrifying
description: Upon first sight, an individual must make a :hard: fear check.

name: Terrifying Howl
description: Anyone hearing the howl of a wrix must make a :hard: Discipline check or become disoriented for one round plus one additional round for every :threat: generated; spend :despair: to stagger the target for one round.

name: Tunnelling
description: Using their powerful maws and their quick-acting acidic saliva, tunnel worms can move through solid stone as if it were difficult terrain.

name: Unstable
description: When thrantas suffer a Critical Injury, they add {ranks|multiply-10} to the Critical Injury roll.

name: Overwhelming Fire
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one allied minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free combat check action.

name: Vacuum Dweller
description: Can survive in vacuum without penalty and can move in a vacuum environment.

name: Venomous
description: Anyone who suffers damage from the Sand Panther must immediately make an :average: Resilience check, suffering 5 Strain on failure; any :threat: generated on the Resilience check adds :setback: to all of the target’s actions for a number of rounds equal to the :threat: generated; :despair: can be spent to make the target test against the venom during the next round.

name: Vulnerable to Blasts
description: Add :boost::boost: to checks made with weapons with the Blast quality targeting minion groups of butterbug remotes.

name: Wilderness Valor
description: Add :boost::boost: to resist fear against wild creatures.

name: Wookiee Rage
description: Deal +1 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks when suffering any Wounds. When suffering a Critical Injury, deal +2 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks instead.

name: Technical Master
description: All subordinates within Medium range add :boost: to all Mechanics checks.

name: Mountain Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Survival and the Natural Outdoorsman talent (once per game session, a Mountain Nikto may reroll any one Resilience or Survival check).

name: Pale Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Athletics. A Pale Nikto never suffers movement penalties for travelling through water and can hold his breath for a number of rounds equal to twice his Brawn rating before beginning to drown.

name: Green Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Coordination and a Green Nikto may add :boost: to checks to climb. Additionally, add claws as an unarmed attack.

name: Red Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Resilience. When making skill checks, a Red Nikto may remove :setback: imposed due to arid or hot environmental conditions.

name: Southern Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Perception. A Southern Nikto may add :boost: to Perception and Vigilance checks to detect sound.

name: Additional Limbs
description: Gain an additional free maneuver per turn, though may not perform more than 2 per turn.

name: All in the Manual
description: When treating clone patients, the Medical Officer adds :boost::boost: to the check.

name: Altered Deal
description: Once per session, Doge Urus may make a :hard: Coercion check to radically change a previously made deal or bargain to his advantage.

name: Atmospheric Requirement
description: Must wear a breathing mask to breath and see outside their native environment. Oxygen is a rating 8 toxic atmosphere. Can survive in vacuum for up to 5 minutes.

name: Band Of Brothers
description: Once per session, when another Clone Commando suffers damage that exceeds their wound threshold and removes them from the fight, this commando may make a single attack against the enemy responsible as an out-of-turn incidental.

name: Bio-Cybernetic Enhancement
description: A Hydroid Medusa is immune to the effects of the Breach and Pierce item qualities, but is susceptible to the Ion quality. When targeted by weapons with the Ion quality, the Medusa’s Soak value is reduced to 8.

name: Blademaster
description: Sora Bulq does not increase difficulty when making attacks with two weapons.

name: Blast ’Em!
description: Once per encounter, Commander Cody may spend a Destiny Point to double the damage resulting from a Gunnery check from a single Republic vehicle in the encounter and add +30 to any Critical Injury or Critical Hit results inflicted on the target from the attack.

name: Blaster Spiral
description: Once per encounter, Highsinger may suffer 4 strain to make a combat check with his light repeating blaster against the hardest to hit enemy (as determined by the GM) within Short range, with a base difficulty of :hard:. On success, every enemy in Short range suffers 1 hit that deals base damage plus additional :success:.

name: Bombastic Personality
description: Once per session, when targeted by a successful social check from another character, the Gungan Boss may force the character to re-roll the check. The results of the second roll must be followed.

name: Brain Worms
description: As an action, the Geonosian Queen may implant a brain worm into a target she is Engaged with, placing that character under her control. At the beginning of each of their subsequent turns, the target may make a :formidable: Discipline check to resist the effects. If they fail, the target remains under the Queen’s control and must follow her commands for that turn. This continues until they pass the check, the Queen is incapacitated or the brain worm is destroyed.

name: Bring It Down!
description: Once per session, the Clone Commander may nominate an enemy vehicle no larger than Silhouette 4. All allies’ weapons reduce their Critical rating by 1 when attacking the target vehicle until the end of the encounter.

name: Brutal Hunter
description: If a target suffers Wounds from his attack, Dengar may suffer up to 3 Strain to inflict a number of additional Wounds equal to the amount of Strain suffered in this way.

name: Buried In The Archives
description: Once per session, Jocasta may recall a highly valuable but obscure piece of information from the Archives that is relevant to the problem at hand. This should be something that she would not otherwise have reason to know.

name: Can’t Stand The Heat
description: Once per session Greedo may, as an action, roll a :daunting: Skulduggery or Streetwise check. If he succeeds, he immediately escapes the current encounter.

name: Cantina Talk
description: When a character is within Short range of Dengar they may suffer 2 Strain to add automatic :advantage::advantage: to Streetwise and Knowledge: Underworld checks they make that turn.

name: Cheater
description: As an action, during a race or chase encounter, Sebulba can make a :hard: Skulduggery check to immediately inflict 2 system strain on any vehicle in the encounter. He may do this up to three times per encounter.

name: Chosen One
description: After Anakin makes a Force power check, other characters in the encounter add :lightside: to their Force power checks until the start of the next turn; if Anakin used any :darkside: to generate :forcepip:, other characters instead add :darkside: to their checks.

name: Clever But Crazy
description: Dr Vindi may suffer 3 strain to make a skill check using Intellect instead of the characteristic associated with the skill.

name: Clone Inhibitor Chip
description: So long as the proper chain of command is observed, upgrade the ability of Leadership checks targeting a clone trooper once.

name: Clumsy
description: Jar Jar adds :setback::setback: to any checks he makes or assists with.

name: Commanding Presence
description: At the beginning of an encounter with Tarkin, each enemy and ally within Medium range or in communication with him makes a :hard: Discipline check as an out-of-turn incidental. Allies who succeed add automatic :advantage: to any skill checks they make until the end of the encounter. If they succeed with :triumph:, they add automatic :success: instead. Enemies who fail add automatic :threat: to skill checks until the end of the encounter. If they fail with :despair:, they add automatic :failure: instead.

name: Concentrate Your Fire!
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one allied minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free combat check action.

name: Confident Command
description: Allies affected by a Leadership check made by Ackbar heal 2 strain.

name: Covering Fire
character: Alderaan Consular Guard, Naboo Palace Guard
description: May spend a maneuver to add +1 ranged Defence to up to three allied characters or minion groups within Short range until the end of the next round; this does not stack with multiple uses.

name: Creature Of Illusion
description: Combat checks targeting the apparition always use Willpower in place of the characteristic normally associated with that skill. The Pierce and Breach qualities do not negate the apparition’s soak.

name: Criminal Mastermind
description: Eval uses Cunning for Negotiation and Underworld checks.

name: Dagoyan Meditation
description: Once per day, Queen Julia may spend two hours in deep moving meditation. Once complete, her Force Rating increases to 3 for the remainder of the day.

name: Dead Shot
description: Prior to making a combat check with a ranged weapon, Jango may suffer 3 strain to reduce the cost of a critical hit to :advantage:.

name: Decoy
description: Once per session, the Naboo Queen may spend a Destiny Point to reveal that she is in fact a Naboo Royal Handmaiden, who has swapped places with the real monarch.

name: Delicate Information
description: Once per session, Ziro may spend a Destiny Point to reveal he possesses valuable blackmail material on any character in the encounter.

name: Didn’t Forget About You
description: Once per encounter, Tiin may upgrade the ability of a Gunnery check he makes against an undamaged vehicle or starship once.

name: Diplomatic Neutrality
description: Once per session as an action, Dod may make a :hard: Deception check. On success, he cannot be a target of combat checks until the end of the encounter or until making a combat check.

name: Diplomatic Solution
description: Once per session, at the GM’s discretion, when a combat encounter against one or more sentient creatures is about to begin, Mina Bonteri may spend a Destiny Point and make a :daunting: Charm check to turn the encounter into a social encounter instead.

name: Dirty Tricks
description: Once per encounter as an action, Dengar may make a :hard: Skulduggery check. If successful, he may select one enemy within Short range, plus one additional target per :success:, to suffer 4 Wounds. After resolving this, Dengar may perform a Move maneuver as an incidental.

name: Disguise Mode
description: As a maneuver, may transform into the appearance of an innocent sweeper droid. If no enemies witness the transformation, the droid immediately gains Deception 3 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:) as a skill.

name: Distracting Quip
description: Once per encounter as an action, may make a :hard: Deception check. Each :success: gives Hondo +1 ranged and melee defence for the next two rounds.

name: Divisive Figure
description: Satine adds :boost::boost: to all social checks against New Mandalorians but suffers :setback::setback: when making social checks against Death Watch targets.

name: Do Or Do Not
description: Yoda allows allies within Short range to downgrade the difficulty of their skill checks once. They may suffer 2 strain to downgrade the difficulty twice instead.

name: Don’t Do That Again
description: When a check Jar Jar makes or assists with generates :despair:, roll :force:. If the roll generates :lightside: then Jar Jar converts the result to :triumph:. If the roll generates :darkside: then Jar Jar increases the result to :despair::despair:. This roll is made for each initial :despair: generated.

name: Drawn In
description: Characters ensnared by a Vixus add :setback::setback: to their checks to break free. If they fail or do not attempt the check, at the end of their turn they are pulled one range band closer to the Vixus’ maw. Should they end their turn at Engaged range of the Vixus, they are swallowed alive and are immobilised until released. Should the Vixus suffer a :hard: or worse Critical injury, or be killed, it immediately releases all captives.

name: Dug Agility
character: Doge Nakha Urus, Dug Cavalier, Sebulba
description: Gains +1 ranged defence due to Dugs’ natural mobility.

name: Duplicitous
description: Once per session as an action, Clovis may make a :hard: Charm or Deception check. On success, he cannot be a target of combat checks until the end of the encounter or until making a combat check himself.

name: Earned Loyalty
description: When commanding clone troopers, Aayla’s Leadership has a rank of 4.

name: Electric Field
description: As an action, when engaged with an energy shield, Derrown may suffer 4 strain to make a :hard: Resilience check. On success, he may completely bypass the energy shield.

name: Exemplary Mentor
description: When using the Skilled Teacher talent, if the target ally is a member of the Jedi Order and in Engaged ranged, Luminara’s rank in the talent counts as 4.

name: Expressionless
description: Kaminoans add :setback: to all Charm checks they make. Other characters add :setback: to all social skill checks they make when targeting Kaminoans.

name: Father To His Men
description: Plo Koon adds :boost::boost: to Leadership checks targeting clone troopers under his command.

name: Field Biology Expert
description: Once per session as an action, when facing an enemy beast with the Adversary talent, Dr Boll may roll a :hard: Xenology check with the difficulty upgraded by the creature’s ranks in Adversary. Success reduces Adversary rank for all creatures of that type by 1 (to a minimum of 0) for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Flexible Morality
description: May use :darkside: at a cost of 1 strain per point.

name: Flow Like Water
description: Orphne’s natural lightning-fast reflexes grant her +1 Defence.

name: Flyer
description: This creature can fly.

name: For Mandalore!
description: Once per session, when Vizsla has exceeded his wound threshold but before he is incapacitated, he may make one out-of-turn attack against a target he is Engaged with.

name: Galvanize The Troops
description: Once per session, Shaak Ti allows all allies in the encounter to downgrade their next skill check once.

name: Geonosian Valour
description: May perform a maneuver to cause all ranged attacks targeting the character to instead hit one ally or helpless enemy in Engaged range, until the beginning of the character’s next turn.

name: Get Down Your Majesty!
description: When Queen Breha is in Engaged range of at least one Alderaan Consular Guard, all ranged attacks targeting the Queen hit the guard instead, unless the attacker is striking from a hidden position (as determined by the GM).

name: Getting Results
description: When accompanied by armed guards, Gunray gains Coercion 2 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:) for as long as they are within Short range.

name: Good Grub
description: A meal cooked up by Dex allows the character to recover 5 strain when eaten.

name: Got You Covered
description: When within Short range of another ARC trooper, may take a second maneuver without suffering strain.

name: Hard Taskmaster
description: Dooku may commit :force: to increase an ally’s existing Force Rating by 1 for as long as they remain in Medium range. The targeted ally suffers 1 strain at the end of each round this is in effect.

name: Hardy Survivalist
description: Add automatic :success: to Survival checks. May survive many weeks without food.

name: Heavy Weapons Proficiency
description: May have either a Z-6 rotary cannon or RPS-6 rocket launcher as their primary weapon. Clone Heavy Weapons Experts are not affected by either weapon’s Cumbersome rating.

name: Hidden Limbs
description: Rancisis may suffer 2 strain to add Linked 2 to his next Brawl check.

name: Hold Them Off
description: Once per encounter, as an out-of-turn incidental, Koth may redirect any ranged attack against an ally in Short range to himself. This must be done after the attack roll but before the result is calculated.

name: Horde
description: An Undead Nightsister minion group gains the Linked item quality on attacks with their grasping claws equal to half the number of Undead Nightsisters in the group, rounded down. This still costs :advantage::advantage: to activate as normal.

name: Hound Master
description: May spend a maneuver to direct any trained beast within Medium range. The beast may perform an immediate free maneuver or add :boost: to their next skill check.

name: Hoverer
description: When hovering the character does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

name: Hoverer (Derrown)
description: Derrown may hover slightly off of the ground. When hovering, he does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

name: Immobile
description: Cannot spend maneuvers to move.

name: Impenetrable Armour
description: The Zillo Beast’s hide has the Cortosis quality and all non-Stun damage taken after soak is halved, rounded down.

name: Improved Covering Fire
description: When allied minion groups within Short range perform the Covering Fire manuever, they add +2 ranged defence instead.

name: Improvised Transport
description: As a maneuver, Embo may convert his Kyuzo helmet into a Silhouette 1, Speed 2, Handling 0, System Strain Threshold 3 vehicle that can only operate on the ground and requires Piloting (Planetary) (:proficiency::proficiency::ability::ability:) to use. While using it in this way, Embo may not use the helmet’s weapon profiles and does not benefit from its Defensive or Deflection item qualities.

name: Incite Uprising
description: Once per session as an action, Lee-Char may make a :hard: Leadership check to cause all Mon Calamari present to become rebellious until the end of the encounter.

name: Indomitable
description: Piell removes up to SETBACK SETBACK caused by Critical Injuries, fear or the Disoriented condition.

name: Infiltrate And Execute
description: May impersonate a known enemy’s voice to gain :boost::boost: on all Deception checks, but upgrades the difficulty once if also attempting to maintain a physical disguise (such as wearing an enemy uniform).

name: Infravision
description: Removal all :setback: imposed due to lighting conditions.

name: Ink Spray
description: Once per encounter, as an out-of-turn incidental, a Quarren may spray ink from their gills, suffering 2 strain to add :setback: to a combat check made by a character within Short range or :setback::setback::setback: if the check is underwater.

name: Insurgent Commander
description: Onderon Resistance members gain :boost: to Discipline and Vigilance checks when in Saw’s presence.

name: Insurgent Leader
description: Onderon Resistance members gain :boost: to Cool and Stealth checks when in Steela’s presence.

name: Interchangeable Weapon
description: May spend a maneuver to switch modes on their DC-17m blaster.

name: Intimidating Countenance
description: Add automatic :advantage::advantage: to all Coercion checks this character makes.

name: Jango’s Legacy
description: Once per session, Boba may upgrade his next combat check twice as an incidental.

name: Jar’Kai Practitioner
description: When wielding dual lightsabers, Barriss uses Agility for Lightsaber combat checks).

name: Joopa Worm Pattern!
description: As a maneuver, make a :hard: Leadership check to allow allies within Short range who move in their following turn to gain +1 Defence for the remainder of the round.

name: Just A Kid
description: When making any social checks, Boba adds :setback::setback: unless the target has a reason to take him seriously.

name: Knife Master
description: Whenever Sugi throws her vibroknife, it gains the Accurate 2 quality.

name: Lancer
description: When piloting a swoop and crossing from Long to Engaged range in a single turn to attack a target, the IG combat lance gains the Breach 1 quality for that turn.

name: Last Stand
description: Once per session, when the General exceeds their wound threshold but before they are incapacitated, they may make a :hard: Leadership check to allow a number of allies equal to :success: to take an immediate out-of-turn maneuver.

name: Lasting Inspiration
description: Once per session, make a :hard: Leadership check when giving orders to an ally; if the check is successful, the ally gains one :boost: for each :success: which can be split up and added as desired to any skill checks the ally makes until the end of the session.

name: Leap
description: Adds :boost::boost: to all Athletics checks made to perform vertical or horizontal jumps.

name: Life And Death
description: Once per encounter, Queen Miraj can order a Zygerrian Royal Guard to immediately execute one of her slaves as an out-of-turn action. The Queen can then force any targets she chooses in the current encounter to make an immediate :daunting-1: fear check.

name: Love Conquers All
description: When using the Inspiring Rhetoric talent, Shmi makes a Charm check instead of Leadership.

name: Loyal To The Last
description: Once per round, when Engaged with the Duchess Satine, the Mandalorian Royal Guard may redirect a single attack against Satine to themselves instead as an out-of-turn incidental.

name: Lumbering
description: May only make one Move maneuver per turn and may not take the Aim maneuver.

name: Magnet Modification
description: Once per session when an enemy uses a thrown metal weapon to attack an ally within Short range of QT-KT, she may negate the attack as an out-of-turn incidental.

name: Mandalorian Valour
description: May perform a maneuver to cause all ranged attacks targeting the character to instead hit one ally or helpless enemy in Engaged range, until the beginning of the character’s next turn.

name: Martial Training
description: Kage Assassins use a unique weapon profile for unarmed combat.

name: Master And Apprentice
description: Once per session, may nominate one ally who has at least Force Rating 1. This ally counts their Force Rating as 1 higher until the end of the encounter.

name: Master Chief
description: When spending :advantage: to inflict additional strain via the Scathing Tirade talent, Bric inflicts 2 strain for each :advantage: spent.

name: Methane Breather
description: Requires methane to live and must wear a special pressure suit. Treats standard planetary air pressure and composition as a corrosive atmosphere with rating 6.

name: Midi-Chlorian Manipulation
description: As an action, Plagueis may target an opponent in Short range and commit :force: to reduce one of their base characteristics by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for the rest of the encounter. This may be used multiple times and across multiple targets.

name: Native Fauna (Ryloth)
description: May remove :setback::setback: imposed due to arid and hot environmental conditions.

name: Native Language (Aleena)
description: Does not speak Basic, and speaks only native Aleena.

name: Native Language (Talz)
description: Does not speak Basic, and speaks only native Talz.

name: Natural Environment
description: When underwater, Kit Fisto gains an additional +1 Defence.

name: Natural Nuisance
description: May use the Distracting Behaviour talent without suffering strain.

name: Neimoidian Courage
description: When all allied NPCs protecting this Neimoidian have been defeated, they must make a :hard: Discipline check. If they fail, they surrender unconditionally.

name: Nite Owl
description: Once per session, Bo-Katan may spend a Destiny Point to take her turn first in the first round of a combat encounter, regardless of initiative order.

name: Now This Is Podracing!
description: When making Piloting (Planetary) checks, Anakin’s Agility counts as 4.

name: Old Contacts
description: Once per session, Finis Valorum may spend a Destiny Point to immediately recall a fact or individual from his time in office that can help resolve the current problem.

name: On A String
description: If the witch who summoned them is killed, the entire Undead Nightsister minion group immediately drops lifeless to the ground.

name: Orphne’s Domain
description: While in her underworld home, Orphne’s Force Rating increases to 3.

name: Pep Talk
description: Gains automatic :advantage::advantage: on Leadership checks when commanding droids.

name: Personality Quirk
description: May take one of these additional skills (this choice is permanent): Charm 2 (:proficiency::proficiency:), Coercion 2 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:), Deception 2 (:proficiency::proficiency:), Negotiation 2 (:proficiency::proficiency:).

name: Playing Politics
description: Once per encounter, Mas Amedda may reverse the result of another character’s successful social check.

name: Ponderous
character: Ziro the Hutt, Geonosian Queen, Hydroid Medusa
description: Can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

name: Positive Reinforcement
description: When El-Les spends :advantage: to allow an ally to recover additional strain via the Inspiring Rhetoric talent, each ally recovers 2 strain for each :advantage: spent.

name: Power Suit
description: Once per session, Seripas may spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: on a successful Ranged (Heavy) check to add the Breach 1 quality to the attack.

name: Pragmatic Negotiator
description: Uses Intellect instead of Presence for Negotiation checks.

name: Protest Chant
description: As a maneuver, a group of 5 or more Anti-War Protesters may upgrade their next Coercion check once.

name: Push The Limits
description: May suffer 2 strain to increase the range of the next attack with their DC-17 pistol or DC-15 rifle by one range band.

name: Rain Of Blows
description: Viscus may activate the Linked 2 item quality on Brawl attacks.

name: Reappropriate
description: As an action, the guard captain can make an :easy: Brawl check to disarm an engaged opponent, and may spend :triumph: to immediately wield the item or weapon.

name: Regeneration
description: When recovering from wounds via natural rest or in a bacta tank, recover 1 additional Wound; first-aid, medical treatment, and stimpacks do not result in recovery from an additional wound; Trandoshans can regrow lost limbs, though it usually takes at least a month before such limbs are usable.

name: Regeneration (Durge)
description: When recovering from wounds via natural rest or in a bacta tank, recover 1 additional Wound. First-aid, medical treatment, and stimpacks do not result in recovery from an additional wound. Durge can regrow lost limbs.

name: Ricochet Shot
description: Once per session, on a successful attack against a minion group with his 773 Firepuncher, Crosshair may flip a Destiny Point to immediately wipe out the remaining minions in that group.

name: Ride The High
description: Once per session as an action, a Pyke Leader may use a single dose of Kessel Boost adrenaline to upgrade all combat checks once for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Rise Sisters
description: As an action, Old Daka enters a meditative state that leaves her unable to move or defend herself. Each subsequent round she uses her action to roll a :hard: Discipline check with :force::force::force: to summon a single Undead Nightsister minion group. Additional minion groups are summoned per additional :success:. Each group summoned contains a number of Undead Nightsisters equal to :darkside: generated.

name: Rocket Pack
description: Allows Teska to function as a Silhouette 1, Speed 2, Handling 0, System Strain Threshold 6 vehicle that requires Piloting (Planetary) (:proficiency::proficiency::proficiency:) to operate.

name: Self Destruct
description: As a maneuver, may transform into a ticking bomb. In this mode, the droid may not move, communicate or use its integrated blasters. As an action, it may detonate using the Self Destruct weapon profile. This instantly destroys the droid.

name: Sensitive Hearing
description: Pau’ans add :boost: to all Perception and Vigilance checks as long as they are wearing their protective earpieces. If not wearing the earpieces, they add :threat: instead.

name: Shadow Commander
description: When using the Field Commander talent to direct Umbarans, the targeted allies do not suffer strain.

name: Shadow Fauna
description: The Vixus uses Cunning for Stealth checks.

name: Shape Shift
description: As an action, suffer 3 strain and make an :average: Resilience check to change appearance to a previously observed Silhouette 1 character. Observers must make an opposed Perception vs. Deception check to detect something is amiss.

name: Shields Up
description: As a maneuver, a minion group of three or more Clone Riot Troopers can increase the Defence bonus granted by their M3 bulwark blast shields to 4. This effect lasts until they either use a subsequent maneuver to move or the number of minions in the group falls below three. They may not make Melee attack rolls whilst this ability is in effect.

name: Shoot Them Or Something!
description: Once per encounter, Gunray may nominate an enemy combatant as a primary target. All allies gain :boost: on attacks made against the target.

name: Short Fuse
description: Once per encounter may reduce the cost to activate an item’s Blast quality to :advantage:.

name: Skilled Cheater
description: Once per session when gambling, Watto may cancel a :despair: he rolls on a skill check, or add a :despair: to another character’s check.

name: Slave Authority
character: Queen Miraj Scintel, Zygerrian Slave Master
description: May use Coercion instead of Leadership when commanding slaves.

name: Sleep Dust
description: During combat, a Kage Assassin may spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: to inflict the Disorient 3 quality on an Engaged opponent.

name: Spectre Of The Dark Side
description: All attacks from the apparition ignore the target’s soak value. Instead, the damage is reduced by the target’s Willpower and ranks in Discipline combined. All damage is dealt as strain.

name: Squad Role
description: May take one of these additional skills (this choice is permanent): Computers 3 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:), Gunnery 2 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:), Leadership 3 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:), or Melee 2 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:).

name: Storage Modification
description: At the GM’s discretion, one silhouette 0 character can hide inside M5-BZ’s chassis.

name: Strategic Direction
description: Once per round, Admiral Yularen may spend a maneuver to direct three Republic Navy NPCs or minion groups within Medium range (this can be at planetary scale for targets on other ships); each target may perform an immediate maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental or instead add :success: to their next check.

name: Sudden Leverage
description: Once per session, Wat Tambor may spend a Destiny Point to produce a piece of highly incriminating information about another character in the encounter. This information can be genuine, or a very high quality counterfeit, at the GM’s discretion.

name: Supremely Terrifying
description: Upon first seeing this creature, an individual must make a :daunting-1: fear check.

name: Sweep Attack
description: The Zillo Beast can spend :triumph: on a successful Brawl check to hit the target as well as anyone Engaged with the target.

name: Techno Service Droid
description: Once per session, Todo 360 may upgrade his next Computers check once as an incidental.

name: Temper Tantrum
description: When Sobeck fails a combat check he suffers 1 strain but gains 1 automatic :success: on his next attack against the same target, so long as he attacks them on his next consecutive turn.

name: Terellian Jango Jumper
description: As a maneuver, Cassie may leap to any location within Short range. In addition, her natural reflexes grant her +1 defense.

name: Terrifying
description: Upon first seeing a Hydroid Medusa, a character must make a :hard: fear check.

name: The Darksaber
description: Vizsla gains :success::advantage: on all social checks against Mandalorians.

name: The Show Goes On
description: Whenever Sy Snootles is performing a song, allies gain :boost::boost::boost: on Stealth and Skulduggery checks against audience members.

name: This Will Do
description: Once per session, Tech may flip a Destiny Point to build a device that functions as an item of Rarity 6 or lower until the end of the encounter.

name: Time To Wreck It
description: Once per session, if Wrecker has exceeded half his wound threshold, he may flip a Destiny Point to enter a berserker rage. For the next three rounds, his wound threshold is doubled and all his attacks have -1 to their critical rating but he cannot benefit from any sources of defence. At the end of the third round, if Wrecker’s total wounds exceed his original wound threshold, he is immediately incapacitated.

name: Trust In The Living Force
description: Once per session, each ally with at least Force Rating 1 in Short range of Qui-Gon counts their Force Rating as one higher until the end of the encounter.

name: Trust The Components
description: Any lightsaber crafting check that Huyang assists with gains automatic :success::success:

name: Trusted Reputation
description: As a maneuver, Bail may make an opposed Charm check against one or more characters within Short range to downgrade the difficulty of a number of future social skill checks equal to net :success: against that character once each, until the end of the encounter.

name: Twin Bond
description: When Tiplee and Tiplar are within Short range of each other and one of them suffers voluntary strain, the other may suffer some or all of the strain instead.

name: Umbaran Bio-Gas
character: Umbaran Commander, Umbaran Militia, Umbaran Tank Crew, Umbaran Starfighter Pilot
description: When wearing an Umbaran bio-suit, Brawn and Agility are increased by 1. This is already incorporated into the profile.

name: Unbeatable Team
description: Whenever Obi-Wan remains within Engaged range of Qui-Gon Jinn, both characters increase their melee and ranged defence by 1.

name: Undead
description: At the end of each combat round, the minion group regenerates a single Undead Nightsister up to a maximum of the group’s original number.

name: Undermining Dissent
description: Once per session, Rash may choose an organisation and make a :hard: Deception check. On success, organisation members have their Strain Thresholds reduced by 1, plus 1 per :success::success: until the end of the session.

name: Undying
description: At the end of each round, Durge makes a :daunting: Resilience check to recover wounds equal to :success:.

name: Vaapad Flourish
description: Once per encounter when making a Lightsaber combat check, Windu may add any uncommitted :force: to the roll. Each :lightside: generated counts as an additional :success: and each :darkside: counts as an additional :threat:.

name: Volatile Temper
description: When a social check against Queen Miraj generates :despair:, she rolls :force:. If the roll generates :darkside: then she immediately attacks the character with her shock whip. She will continue attacking the character for a number of rounds equal to :darkside: generated. She can be convinced to calm down and cease attacking early by a successful Coercion, Charm, Deception or Negotiation check from a character other than the target.

name: We Are The Bad Batch
description: Once per session, Hunter may spend a Destiny Point to allow himself and up to two allies to take a second turn at the end of the current round. This extra turn does not impact the duration of any other abilities or status effects.

name: We Must Push On!
description: Once per encounter, as a maneuver, Mundi may make a :hard: Leadership check to immediately remove any fear-related effects from all allies within Short range.

name: Weapon Modification
description: Once per session U9-C4 may make an attack with his arc welder using the following profile: Damage 12; Critical 2; Range [Engaged]; Pierce 2, Prepare 1, Vicious 3.

name: Weequay Pheromones
description: Weequay may communicate with other Weequay using pheromones if they are within Short range of each other.

name: Wookiee Rage
description: Deals +1 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks when suffering any wounds. When suffering a Critical Injury, deals +2 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks instead.

name: Hard Bargain
description: May use Cunning for Negotiation checks.
